titles: Mortalities meditation: or, A description of sinne VVith a definition and plaine setting forth of mans three chiefest and greatest enemies; to wit, the world, the flesh, and the Diuell. Written by William Hall.
author: Hall, William, fl. 1624.
publisher: By Aug. Mathewes, for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
